00115             function                get_type( $Predicates )
00116             {
00117                   try
00118                   {
00119                         $Types = array( 'integer' , 'float' , 'command' , 'string' , 'email' , 'email' , 'set' , 'raw' );
00120                         
00121                         foreach( $Predicates as $p )
00122                         {
00123                               $Key = array_search( $p , $Types );
00124                               if( $Key !== false )
00125                               {
00126                                     return( $Types[ $Key ] );
00127                               }
00128                         }
00129                         
00130                         throw( new Exception( "Type was not found" ) );
00131                   }
00132                   catch( Exception $e )
00133                   {
00134                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00135                   }
00136             }

00160             function                process_integer_list_data( $Data )
00161             {
00162                   try
00163                   {
00164                         if( is_array( $Data ) )
00165                         {
00166                               $Data = implode( ',' , $Data );
00167                         }
00168                         
00169                         $Matches = array();
00170                         $Data = str_replace( '\\' , '' , $Data );
00171                         preg_match( '/^[0-9\,\']+$/' , $Data , $Matches );
00172                         
00173                         if( count( $Matches ) > 0 )
00174                         {
00175                               return( $Data );
00176                         }
00177                         else
00178                         {
00179                               throw( new Exception( "Illegal symbols were found '$Data'" ) );
00180                         }
00181                   }
00182                   catch( Exception $e )
00183                   {
00184                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00185                   }
00186             }

00210             function                process_command_data( $Data )
00211             {
00212                   try
00213                   {
00214                         $RetData = '';
00215                         $s = strlen( $Data );
00216                         for( $i = 0 ; $i < $s ; $i++ )
00217                         {
00218                               if( ( $Data[ $i ] >= 'a' && $Data[ $i ] <= 'z' ) ||
00219                                     ( $Data[ $i ] >= 'A' && $Data[ $i ] <= 'Z' ) || 
00220                                     ( $Data[ $i ] >= '0' && $Data[ $i ] <= '9' ) || 
00221                                     $Data[ $i ] == '_' || $Data[ $i ] == ':' || $Data[ $i ] == '-' || $Data[ $i ] == '.' )
00222                               {
00223                                     $RetData .= $Data[ $i ];
00224                               }
00225                         }
00226                         
00227                         return( $RetData );
00228                   }
00229                   catch( Exception $e )
00230                   {
00231                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00232                   }
00233             }

00257             function                process_string_data( $Data )
00258             {
00259                   try
00260                   {
00261                         if( $this->String === false )
00262                         {
00263                               $this->String = get_package( 'string' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00264                         }
00265                         
00266                         $Data = $this->String->hide_safe_macro( $Data );
00267                         $Data = htmlspecialchars( $Data , ENT_QUOTES , 'UTF-8' );
00268                         $Data = str_replace( '{' , '[lfb]' , $Data );
00269                         $Data = str_replace( ';' , '[dot_comma]' , $Data );
00270                         $Data = str_replace( '=' , '[eq]' , $Data );
00271                         $Data = str_replace( '#' , '[sharp]' , $Data );
00272                         $Data = str_replace( '}' , '[rfb]' , $Data );
00273                         $Data = str_replace( "\r" , '[r]' , $Data );
00274                         $Data = str_replace( "\n" , '[n]' , $Data );
00275                         $Data = $this->String->show_safe_macro( $Data );
00276                         $Data = str_replace( '&' , '[amp]' , $Data );
00277                         
00278                         return( $Data );
00279                   }
00280                   catch( Exception $e )
00281                   {
00282                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00283                   }
00284             }

00358             function                process_unsafe_string_data( $Data )
00359             {
00360                   try
00361                   {
00362                         if( $this->String === false )
00363                         {
00364                               $this->String = get_package( 'string' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00365                         }
00366                         
00367                         $Data = str_replace( '[lfb]' , '{' , $Data );
00368                         $Data = str_replace( '[dot_comma]' , ';' , $Data );
00369                         $Data = str_replace( '[eq]' , '=' , $Data );
00370                         $Data = str_replace( '[sharp]' , '#' , $Data );
00371                         $Data = str_replace( '[rfb]' , '}' , $Data );
00372                         $Data = str_replace( '[amp]' , '&' , $Data );
00373                         
00374                         $Data = htmlspecialchars_decode( $Data , ENT_QUOTES );
00375                         
00376                         return( $Data );
00377                   }
00378                   catch( Exception $e )
00379                   {
00380                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

00406             function                process_email_data( $Data )
00407             {
00408                   try
00409                   {
00410                         $RetData = '';
00411                         $c = strlen( $Data );
00412                         for( $i = 0 ; $i < $c ; $i++ )
00413                         {
00414                               if( ( $Data[ $i ] >= 'a' && $Data[ $i ] <= 'z' ) ||
00415                                     ( $Data[ $i ] >= 'A' && $Data[ $i ] <= 'Z' ) || 
00416                                     ( $Data[ $i ] >= '0' && $Data[ $i ] <= '9' ) || 
00417                                     $Data[ $i ] == '_' || $Data[ $i ] == ':' || 
00418                                     $Data[ $i ] == '-' || $Data[ $i ] == '.' || 
00419                                     $Data[ $i ] == '@' || $Data[ $i ] == '=' || 
00420                                     $Data[ $i ] == '+' )
00421                               {
00422                                     $RetData .= $Data[ $i ];
00423                               }
00424                         }
00425                         
00426                         return( $RetData );
00427                   }
00428                   catch( Exception $e )
00429                   {
00430                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00431                   }
00432             }

00460             function                process_data( $Data , $Type )
00461             {
00462                   try
00463                   {
00464                         switch( $Type )
00465                         {
00466                               case( 'integer' ):                  return( intval( $Data ) );
00467                               case( 'integer_list' ):       return( $this->process_integer_list_data( $Data ) );
00468                               case( 'float' ):              return( floatval( $Data ) );
00469                               case( 'command' ):                  return( $this->process_command_data( $Data ) );
00470                               case( 'string' ):             return( $this->process_string_data( $Data ) );
00471                               case( 'script' ):             return( $this->process_script_data( $Data ) );
00472                               case( 'unsafe_string' ):      return( $this->process_unsafe_string_data( $Data ) );
00473                               case( 'email' ):              return( $this->process_email_data( $Data ) );
00474                               case( 'raw' ):                      return( $Data );
00475                               default:                            throw( new Exception( 'Undefined data type' ) );
00476                         }
00477                   }
00478                   catch( Exception $e )
00479                   {
00480                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00481                   }
00482             }
00483             
00516             function                dispatch_complex_data( $Data , $Type )
00517             {
00518                   try
00519                   {
00520                         if( $this->Security === false )
00521                         {
00522                               $this->Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00523                         }
00524                         $Ret = array();
00525                         foreach( $Data as $key => $d )
00526                         {
00527                               if( is_array( $d ) || is_object( $d ) )
00528                               {
00529                                     $d = $this->Security->get( $d , $Type );
00530                                     ( is_object( $d ) || count( $d ) ) ? $Ret[ $key ] = $d : false;
00531                               }
00532                               else
00533                               {
00534                                     if( $Type == 'string' || $Type == 'command' || $Type == 'raw' || strlen( $d ) != 0 )
00535                                     {
00536                                           $Ret[ $key ] = $this->Security->get( $d , $Type );
00537                                     }
00538                               }
00539                         }
00540                         return( $Ret );
00541                   }
00542                   catch( Exception $e )
00543                   {
00544                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00545                   }
00546             }
00547       }
